question.title: Question
question.description: In cases of infectious diarrhoea in adults and children, which of the following symptoms would most urgently necessitate emergency treatment due to the risk of dehydration and Hemolytic Uremic Syndrome (HUS)?

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: Mild abdominal discomfort and occasional loose stools

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: Severe dehydration and blood in stool

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: Loss of appetite and slight fatigue
